*FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2AEM4-A010001 2AEM4-A010001] (2015-12-28) [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2858560 PCB images] :Wi-Fi System using multiple units connected via Wi-Fi mesh. <!--{{FCC ST|06/05/2016|indexme.}}-->
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32962-eero-home-wi-fi-system-reviewed ''eero Home Wi-Fi System Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Instead of dedicated 2.4 and 5GHz radios, one radio :serves up both 2.4 and 5GHz high band (Ch 149-163). :The other is dedicated to 5GHz low band (Ch 36-48).
